Because if you "truly cherish the lives that you and your friends here have, based on your current change in tone, "this tells me that they now belong to me. Perhaps you would wish to continue to make this agreement "you came to make. Show me your card."

Hitting the ground, and scattering across the stonework, some of them stopping at your feet or beyond, a series of black, metal rings that match the ones that the two giants wear around their neck.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With a saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So roll another.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no. You roll and then you add your saving throw bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pike, Vex, Keyleth, and Percy all suffer a point of exhaustion. Pike, your speed is halved right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Pike, but you're already so little!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My what's halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your speed is halved, so you are trailing behind everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, pick her up, she looks like she needs some water.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, I'm just so tired.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look so mopey.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel very mopey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want a piggyback ride?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I pick her up and I put her on my shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go ahead and take a little break for now. Go ahead and use the restroom--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You looked like the creepy guy was saying we should take a break for just a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back everyone to Critical Role. That was terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The timing. Well, she's been gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's been gone a while. It's okay, welcome back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, you're amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just not working right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. So. You guys have returned to Senokir and Uten's establishment to rest until you feel is necessary to undertake this endeavor. But it is your guys' prerogative as to if you want to wait over the next day, day and a half to jump to it or is there anything you want to do to prepare for this circumstance? What do you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's sleep in the mansion so we can gain some of our--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah let's sleep in the mansion till we can at least get rid of this

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If it's a day or two, we could go back to Daxio and check and come back. But then we'd have to get back into the city. That's probably a terrible idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I bamf right here? What's your name? What is Simma sina--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sequin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Senokir. Took a ten-minute break and that's it. Senokir, is there a way we could-- If I wanted to Plane Shift home, is there a way that I could Plane Shift right back here and not get, you know, our heads chopped off for it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. Is there?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me check, guys. You know, let me check the druidic texts and see what they say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Specifically, you can choose a target in general terms. It'll probably bring you right back to where you arrived here. So you'd be back to the outside of the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the respawn point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I can't say Senokir's jewelry shop in the City of Brass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can specify a target or destination in general terms. So the City of Brass or Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells. You appear in or near that destination.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No guarantee that we'd be back in. So we should stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you. Crapshoot, it's possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As long as we know that Allura will send us a message if something goes wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did it get dark out at all? Or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, by this time, as you guys have gotten back and ended this rest you guys have really come to get really thirsty, and as the exhaustion hits in, you all continue to reach for your waterskins and they're dried up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should go back into the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sun, however, has gone to a darker red color, like a soft eclipse almost. And as it does, the heat remains but the light gets dimmer and dimmer into a red twilight. And as it does, the city shuts down. Everybody goes home, locks up, and nothing but the efreet that you saw wandering the streets earlier with the little flaming brooches or amulets in the uniform outfit wander the streets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why doesn't anyone go outside at night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pardon me. (sneezes)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bless you, Senokir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sneezes)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me a third one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bless you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ask this to Senokir?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's largely because the Illuminated maintain a curfew. And if you don't follow the "curfew, you'll wind up in chains."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Different chains than regular chains?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At first, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Waterskins from our servants--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's that guy? What is that guy?

lines.name: OFFSCREEN
lines.text: Thanks, Gov'ner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you require water I can procure that for you, if you like."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you want water I can procure that for you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we get water from the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we have water in his fucking jug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We've got so much water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can also create water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but he's got a jug full of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike and I can create water. Me and Pike both can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can create water. Don't say it like it's cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're not speaking in metaphor. We know you can create water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, what do you guys wish to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, are we in a hurry, do we want to try to make this happen tonight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not talking about him, I'm talking about doubling back to the house and trying to get through the servants' window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You really want to try to break into this fire giant's house?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we're in a hurry, I mean we've killed some pretty gnarly things, I know they're big. So are we.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She could be gnarlier than the giants that we've fought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And there might be an unbelievable amount of fire giants in that building.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or traps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or allies nearby. It's in the middle of a city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. And I'm sure the other thing will be super easy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The pit fiend?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's on the table. I mean, whatever, you know. I'm going to follow your lead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to do a smash and grab?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can they chase us down if we do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Classic B&E? Plane Shift takes a minute--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's instant. Remember, we checked it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes an action. As long as we're all in a circle holding hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And what happens if you can't Plane Shift out of that house? We probably want to get out of the house and then Plane Shift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In case it's magically locked down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In case it's magically locked down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's pretty smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In which the phrase, "I have many enchantments upon my home," led me to believe there's probably--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I really don't see what the problem is, right? Hellfiend goes, "Oh, time to go shopping for slaves." He walks up to the Arches, we set a trap, Vax goes stabby-stab-stab, Percy goes (gunshot), Pike goes, (high-pitched) "Hi", and like, donesky!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're writing the best children's book ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I'm down, I think that's a great plan, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He also said that the pit fiend could be there in one to two days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could be there tomorrow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, do we know how much time passes in the fire plane versus the real world?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain, comparatively the time. You feel like you've been here for, I mean, a while. By the cycle of the sun-like light source in the sky here on the plane, it seems like you've been here for about a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we remember any type of relative time jump when we were here last time in and out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but you were only here for maybe a handful of hours last time you guys came here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were you worried about being away from Fort Daxio for too long?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I was suggesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean we could come back to Thordak just destroyed everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't we scry on the fort?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't scry between dimensions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has to be on the same plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you scry on the pit fiend?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know what it looks like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you know like a thing for him, right? We know his name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, watering boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cabin boy, thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I meant! That's what I wanted to say!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I use the scrying eye to try and scry on the pit fiend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You certainly can. So you have secondhand knowledge of the pit fiend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And trying to imagine his emblem that she described with the two manacles and the black chain, because that was pretty cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the spell DC of the scrying orb?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be 15. Unless you cast the spell, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I get to do it, so it should still be mine, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Usually it would be set for the item, but for the purposes of this it won't make a huge difference. What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, okay yeah, so it won't make a difference. You close your eyes and you see a brief fuzzy vision of the city from your perspective and then your vision jumps suddenly and comes to fire, then comes to black, then comes to a quick view of that weird citadel, carved out of black obsidian hands reaching over each other, the one that you saw earlier, the embassy. Then you feel a wall and you're thrust through a series of walls, not able to really take in any visuals, the process is so fast, wall after wall, then you come to a darkened room, a wide chamber that contains a long series of papers and scrolls that are laid out in a specific format. You can see, chained to the walls, individuals moaning and crying. And you see, sitting in this small circle in the center of the floor, a humanoid-- a humanoid in the sense that it has arms or legs-- but you see the pit fiend sitting there, almost meditating, eyes closed, large teeth, jagged and pointed, coming out of its large jaw, dark red horns that curve behind its head, these large wings that are folded around it from the back as it sits its knees out, crosslegged, its arms resting upon the edges, eyes closed. It appears to be sleeping. Or at least resting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a focus on what the slaves look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately you can't, the target of your scry is about the most you can focus on; you can give a blurry atmosphere around them, you can barely pick up the aspect of their presence, but that's the most you can do with the scry spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Well, he appears to be in his bedroom, definitely in the citadel. As she said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he have any, like, cuts on him, anything that looks weak?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He had big gnarly teeth and slaves.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did he look scary?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He looked very unpleasant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it's just him, right? One dude?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could take one dude!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he also had a bunch of people chained to the wall, and this was after my vision being slammed through several walls. It seemed to be very deep in the labyrinth that is the embassy, which seems like a labyrinth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we'll have to wait until he comes out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we trick him into the mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The mansion door, I think, is only ten feet tall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How tall is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best that you could tell, probably close to 15 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could duck in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a little taller than Grog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What kind of slaves did it look like he had? All types?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tried to look. I couldn't tell. Looked like a nice variety.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we said, "Hey, I heard there's really good slaves up in this mansion--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then what do we do in the mansion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can quietly attack him from all sides. Have a fight that won't draw the attention of the guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something tells me that people fight in this city a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I don't think the slaves attack the owners very often.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing we could damage in there that would remain damaged.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless we tried to use ourselves as slave bait again, put a few of us on the auction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You seemed to be able to talk Yenk into doing whatever you wanted. Do you think you could do that with this guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could certainly make an appearance of Yenk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I meant convince him to come inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean Dominate him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could be much more intelligent than Yenk was, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He wears jewelry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has a logo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He meditates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He meditates?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bikram yoga.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that the hot one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the hot one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we go recon on the auction as slave shopping or whatever it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the morning. Not now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Set up the door outside of the market or whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, he's going to the auction to slave shop?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unique slaves. He likes unique slaves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems crazy that a gigantic fucking pit boss, whatever he is, would be like, "Oh, sure, I'll "step into this creepy door, weird stranger!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The mansion door is rather creepy, isn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, for sure! Everything about me is creepy, guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it's unique, and what if inside the door we make it look even more unique?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, can't you make the mansion look like anything you want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within reason.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's important to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are limitations. It's still a mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if it looks like a sexy den or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and if he doesn't come in the door, then we kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This seems like a plan C to me. Convincing a giant killing machine to step into a nice house seems like it's a desperate plan of people without anything at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not a giant killing machine, he's a businessman looking to purchase--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, do we go and make a deal with the devil? (goofy chuckle)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The deal is we just attack him and kill him! What's the big deal? We were sent on a killing mission here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are we going to kill him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wherever we see him! Let's talk to Sonny here, creepy Sonny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could one of us goad him into following us out of his abode or some building, somewhere, and you plop the mansion door outside the actual door? So he goes to try to leave the tavern or whatever the fuck, he goes into our house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ultimately, if we can get him in a building and then back out of the building, great. But if we can get him in that building, why can't we get him in the fucking mansion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you understand, for a person to walk into the mansion, they have to know they're walking into the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we can definitely entice them. You guys can pose as slaves and show him some amazing feats and say, "There's more where that came from, inside the mansion!" but if he says no, then what's our plan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Senokir pipes up at this point. He's been listening in to this whole conversation off to the side. He goes, "If you are indeed going to fight a creature of this esteem, I will request to not be "present. Thus, you will be masterless in this city. I don't know how to protect you the way you look."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't we have the neck rings, the collars, to mock that we're--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps. That will be helpful. Just make sure you have a solid story, or another way "of masking yourself. Otherwise--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make us all look different. What would make us passable in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, dressed more like us, or the others who are free. It all depends on what you can look like."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Less appealing. Less different.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Or, at least, amongst the elite of this city, where you won't be bothered."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make us all robes and stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't we want to look unique for him to want--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seeming allows you to tailor us, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, what does Seeming allow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can shrink or grow us by a foot, change our general appearance and clothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about we do a little bit of both? We can have a few of us, maybe two, as slaves, the rest as masters, walking around incognito. Once one of us gets sold off, we track him back so we're not fighting a member of the Embassy of the City of Brass in the middle of the market.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like the mansion idea. What if we pitched the mansion as a traveling magical boutique slave shop? Artisan slave shop? We lube this guy up in a loincloth and this guy after a hard day's tinkering, and we sell them! This guy can sell anything! This guy could sell a hunk of shit to the Emperor of Emon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These people have seen a lot of shit, not just one hunk of shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you and I dressed in exact, identical clothing, and then we're unique? We're, you know, twin slaves?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could all look the same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a fantasy that people have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the plan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, what's going on? We're all looking like you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're septuplets! Sextuplets! And you're the salesman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm selling a group of identical sextuplet slaves and the advantage is just that they look cool? "Check out my slaves; they all look alike!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you give us one order, we all understand the order!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somehow, a stamp with an upside-down airplane is worth a fortune. This, obviously, is more rare.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could make you all other ways unique.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, we're fairly attractive! I feel like six of us would be worth the price of admission.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Although you can only grow us or shrink us by a foot, so this would be a really little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll make her taller and you two shorter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I also throw out that maybe six might be pushing it a little? Maybe we should drop it down to, like, quadruplets?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! Because six is what he's walking around with! He's got more back in his shop!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got the word "sex" right in it! Sextuplets! Sex sells! Sextuplets sell!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can do it. Magic door, sextuplets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love this idea, don't get me wrong, but I feel like convincing him that you are able-bodied slaves with magical abilities might be even more of icing on the cake than, "Hey, they look alike!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: SAM; All right, and when it doesn't work, Sonny, can we fight him right there in the Arches? Will people be like, "What the fuck's going on? Arrest them all!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is a known entity in this city. If you wish to fight him in the open, I would recommend "having a way of perhaps having the Illuminated on your side."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the guards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is the guard."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Artisanal half-elf slaves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. If we can convince them that he's broken a law of some sort--

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Bribes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could also try to convince them that he's broken a law or done something horrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's against the law here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, going against the sultan is the most grievous of things. He is a paranoid one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's the one in the big-- no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In the Charcoal Palace."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could make the image of our mark standing out there in the middle of the Arches, cursing the sultan's name and pissing all over the place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, but listen, I don't know if we have enough to bribe all the efreet. What if we went to the Charcoal Palace, spewed a tale, and said that this pit fiend is plotting to overthrow the Charcoal Palace and all we want is to remove the problem for him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can really recommend you not go near that palace."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's not do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, we do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, let's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They have wards to pierce through lies. You will find yourselves never heard from again, if "you have falsehood in your midst."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the sultan mark his slaves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The sultan, I imagine, would, though I am not aware of it myself."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he have a seal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe so."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we were to sell ourselves as slaves, we could be marked as the property of the sultan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then we could claim that he was trying to steal property of the sultan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we still sextuplets in this scenario?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even if we're just sneaking back into the house and stealing the armor, we're doing it as identical sextuplets. There's no fighting that anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One addendum. Our sizes don't change, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make you a foot taller or smaller.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From biggest to smallest. That's unique!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we're spending a lot of time on this, and maybe not enough time on our battle plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that would go to shit anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so far, let's recap. Recap, vote, and move on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Senokir, if you saw a bunch of people who looked the same, that went from small to big, wouldn't you want them as slaves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depending."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were totally hot, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And also, if they had skills, each of them had a separate skill?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most likely. There are many unique slaves that pass through the Arches."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? What's the most unique one you've ever seen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They've had a few celestials through before. Those generally fetch a pretty penny with "the individuals you're speaking about. The winged ones, they apparently are very sought-after by the "Nine Hells."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wings! You have wings!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we could Seeming wings?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but they could probably see through that shit! His are real!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So far, only Cinnabons here has been able to see through my shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like they'd be able to tell. But whatever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If each of the sextuplets-- I'm never going to get tired of saying that-- were unique in their own way, and yours was that you had a trace of celestial which is why you have wings?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we still want to try and get him in the mansion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, I'm going to recap these plans, here. Plan A, making us all sextuplets and trying to get him into the mansion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Celestial sextuplets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plan B, we're all sextuplets--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeming does not add wings. It has the same arrangement of body parts. But if one of them has wings, you could change those wings into a different color.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use Alter Self, because Alter Self gives-- because I can give myself gills and stuff like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, Plan A, again, sextuplets, slaves, mansion. Plan B, we're still sextuplets, but this time, we're somehow framing him for dishonoring the sultan and then attacking him in the middle of the square.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why Plan A is much better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plan C, still sextuplets, that doesn't change, but now we're just ambushing him in the center of the Arches and we've paid off the guards to turn a blind eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have enough money to pay off the guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have tons of money!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we could bribe them with six identical slaves. So what's it going to be? Plan A, the mansion that's certainly going to fail? Plan B, the framing job? Or Plan C, the bribery slash ambush?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plan A, into plan B if it doesn't work!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember, we're just to show off. You've got more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course I've got more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the sultan's name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The sultan's name is the Grand Sultan of the Efreet, the Lord of Flame, the Potentate "Incandescent, the Tempering and Eternal Flame of Truth, the Most Puissant of Hunters, Marshal of "the Order of the Fiery Heart, the Smoldering Dictator, the Crimson Firebrand, Marrake al-Sidan "al-Hariq ben Lazen."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like when you start the little Halloween sing-y things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I almost got it memorized though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought Percy's was long, shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine's better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scan-Man, can you rearrange the inside of the mansion to look like whatever you want--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what would it be? A slave auction house?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could it be a theater for presentation, or a ring to show off amazing skills? Wings, arrows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A circus side-show thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere between the Folies Bergere and Caligula's living room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caligula's living room, I can do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe have a little side area with hookah and some nice dancers, you know? As he watches, to add to the atmosphere?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Within reason. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Once the mansion is built, does it stay built? It rebuilds every time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's like a Windows PC. You can change the desktop settings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if the ladies went on a redecorating tear really fast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They hung a bunch of fabric up and lit some candles?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dim the lights.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still a mansion. You have an indoor foyer. You can customize any other floor plan you like, and the decor of it, but it still looks like a mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can put pieces of fabric up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Opium den style.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we build a stage out of chickens?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could have little slave chickens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's try this stupid, crazy plan. So, we're going to go to the Arches tomorrow, disguised as the slaves of what's-her-butt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Juuraiel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've already made a sale, and you have more back at the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I look like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever you want to look like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Senny, what would I look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would recommend not being a pink-skinned gnome like yourself. Perhaps something that could "live in this city."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like maybe an imp!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "An imp would be interesting."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An imp with jewelry and such?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "However, an imp would not be solo and would probably still be behooven to the Nine Hells, and "would work and be considered a subordinate to a pit fiend. I would not recommend an imp."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give me a thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps an azer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, as you would consider, close to them-- a dwarf. You may have seen a few." You've seen a couple of strange individuals throughout the city as you've walked by. They're dwarf-like, they're thick, they're muscular. They look like a dwarf, except for instead of hair and a beard, it's fire. A wreath of fire across dark grey, almost obsidian skin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Baby Ghost Rider.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome! Be one of those!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To give you a specific visual, to give you a feel for what I'm talking about here, when I say--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's baby Ghost Rider!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Flames!

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN, MATT
lines.text: (high-pitched) Flames on the side of my face! Heaving, heaving breaths.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll make a mansion for the night. We'll all take a rest and then go tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was going to make some beds. We have--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's so kind of you! But we have beds that are specific to us, and we--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just the break from the heat is the only thing that would force us to deny your hospitality.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we will keep the door to our rooms, of course, in your abode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. We'll discuss soon our arrangement. Good night."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why does he keep doing that?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should one of us sleep in his house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, nobody should!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's something wrong in it. There's something in the basement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a quick request. Before I go to sleep, can I try and find Pike and see if she will teach me the alphabet, before my fox's cunning wears off?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the saddest thing I've ever heard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry about that. You open your door and you see Grog standing there, looking a little sheepish.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, what's wrong?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, look, I had trouble sleeping, and I actually know Giant, but I can't read it. Do you think maybe, before this fancy smart-potion wears off, you could teach me some letters?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, if we have a book or something, I could. A Beginning to Read Giant, is there anything like that where I could know what the letters are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well no, I don't see a lot of Giant, just even Common or--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just Common letters? Yes, I can show you the alphabet. I'll write it out. Okay? Do you know how to spell your name? Okay. It's very easy. You have four letters in your name, but there are two of the same letter. So you really only have three letters in your name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many-- I'm not so hot on the numbers, either.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, what's the first letter of the alphabet? This you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: G.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's the first letter of your name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it is!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, but that's not the first letter of the alphabet. You've said it before. Ah--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah-- I. Hey!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! It's the first letter, well, you wouldn't know that, because you don't know how to spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking A, this is tough.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! You said it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking? A?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A! A is the first letter of the alphabet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A. Ay. A. A.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And we can keep going-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so mean!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Flowers for Grogernon. But it wouldn't have mattered because the Common alphabet and Giant runics are totally different things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally. I just wanted to know something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did I at least teach him how to spell his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I still-- no, it wore off, right? I don't have advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it, Grog! Roll a natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, as you feel the potion fading from you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I burp, and I get a little bubble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead and roll an intelligence check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's even worse. Aw, minus two, fuck! Twelve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get "Gr--" and that's where it ends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My cursive is sweet. I'm so tired. You know, I've learned all of these but I'm really sleepy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll keep working on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not sure we will. But yeah, keep working. Good night. Thank you, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You sleep so well, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smash cut to a year later where he's going, "See. Kevdak. Run."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! That's so cute! Before I go to sleep, I am going to cast Lesser Restoration on myself, to maybe get rid of one point of exhaustion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Out of curiosity, sleeping outside of the effects of the heat should make--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd the Greater Restoration, technically, to try and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's AC in here, isn't there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's AC.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Greater Restoration reduces exhaustion. But you can do that as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll cast Greater Restoration before bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you reduce a level of exhaustion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Netting ammo for the trebuchet, just a sketch. To start to design a very simple bolo for the trebuchet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Just designing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just penciling and then penciling-- I've got a notion for a watch tower that's super super simple. Platform for two people, tops, with a rope that connects to a bell so when you start heading down it, it goes (high voice) Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. All right. So, as you guys all come to consciousness the next day, you gather your things and you step out of the mansion into the center of Senokir's shop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we recover our point of exhaustion when we sleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the long rest, you recover a point of exhaustion, so you'll all back to baseline, including you, Pike, because your Greater Restoration. Your spells are recovered, HP is recovered, if there was any loss of it. So, the day is yours, what do you wish to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to The Arches. The golden arches. Wait, first we've got to cast Seeming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to scout-- I guess we still need Seeming.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So we're all going to look like Vax?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Vex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And Vex. All the girls are going to look like Vex.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three Vex's, I mean, it's kind of the same.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, yeah, but one's got boobs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) This is awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tattered clothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. No, make us look like good slaves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Simple white robes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I want to look pretty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're so rich, you want us clean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make us clean, like pretty slaves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're clean. That's right. You're the best of the best. You would have the best robes. Right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like Princess Leia, Jabba the Hut.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Totally right. The best, finest simple white.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we still have the neck thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely. And wait, am I making him celestial-ish?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, make his wings, when they come out, like white wings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a celestial? What does a celestial look like? Do they glow all the time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They have white wings, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most angelic entities have white or gold wings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we find out if I could Alter Self wings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could not. It has to be the same physical structure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait a minute. We don't want him walking through the streets, to The Arches, as a celestial. We want to get him in the house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When he pops his wings, the wings will be gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we haven't started walking though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can they be gold, delayed later, when they pop out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. Well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you hide them under a cape?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know where you hide them normally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They only last for an hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In my shoulder blades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're in you? Ew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, it feels that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you Wolverine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are learning way too much about everyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Seeming on everybody but Vax, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Seeming on us-- We look like us already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just clothes, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we headed to The Arches yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're walking there right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to walk with a celestial in the middle of the streets?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're saying we're not making his wings look like that yet, dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are not sure where The Arches are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Senokir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we maybe go scout the location first as regular slaves?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you require?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, where are The Arches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you require guidance there? Uten, why don't you bring them to The Arches. I will not be "joining you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish not to get involved with a pit fiend. I will ask though, just to be safe, if I "could have, of your choice, one small bauble to remember you by. As we still have an arrangement "to discuss, and knowing, to an extent, your capabilities, there's a chance that you might "escape without returning to me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that for memories or for some voodoo shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's voodoo shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is to make sure that should you abscond without upholding your end of the deal, I can find you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From each of us or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can give him one of the Sandkheg bottles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's okay. I Druidcraft a band around his arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. That'll die soon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can, like, preserve it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's going to die, Keyleth. Don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It'll still function. It just will be lifeless. So, continue please. Stay safe."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uten is like, "Okay, follow me. I will lead you." Even he is looking a little weird over at Senokir.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And when I cast Seeming, I also cast it on myself, making myself look like an azer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An azer. The flaming beard dwarf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know if I can make flames with Seeming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of the illusion you can pull off something that resembles flames enough to the point where it should pass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see large banners and streamers set across elements of the road to mark various segments of this area, and at this point Uten turns to you and goes, "Well, you have officially reached The Arches. I will bid you adieu as I also will not "want to deal with a pit fiend. Good luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Uten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what happens? Are these all for sale then and--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All the ones that do not look like they're yelling for you to buy something. Most likely."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, if you like do the door thing here then this could potentially be a market.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it okay to just set up shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you are convincing enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Convincing enough?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we need a shingle to put out front?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A sign?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flowers to make it look pretty?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth, can you shape something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go stand over by Grog. I'll talk to you later, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go walk over to Grog and look up at a much larger, slightly butcher version of yourself staring down at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! Slightly? Completely butcher! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's up, me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to pose and start selling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we'll set up shop and only sell to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could also, theoretically-- I just don't know well these things can see through other things. I could do Hallucinatory Terrain right around this and make us look like a little legit kiosk. With a little entrance incorporating your door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much can you change the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can control it as much as I want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you grow a gazebo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but people will see the gazebo appear out of nowhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a magical tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we need to sell people? We just need a slab to put them up on. To say, "Look here, "there's this one for sale."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course, we're going to have you guys outside. How else are we going to convince him that there is more good stuff inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're the showroom window.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you grow a gazebo out of grapevines?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's not break the bank.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I could do some Druidcraft but that's minor. Growing a gazebo out of vines, that's Plant Growth. I guess I could do Plant Growth fairly instantly, without the full-- because it's a one or the other kind of a thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you said Hallucinatory Terrain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do we need a fucking gazebo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just fucking stand here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't want to look like Three Card Monte guys with a cardboard box--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we danced?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matthew, what does everyone else have around them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still feel like if we are a crowd of slaves at a door--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are the other kiosks? Are there any?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's this weird constant barking, almost auction type atmosphere, where it's a lot of din, noise, music, and voices shouting over each other. It's also very crowded in this area. There are a couple small parts, there's like an alleyway nearby where there is a little more of an opening. Like if there was a spot to set up it would be there, if not there's-- probably could traverse the rest of the vicinity of the slave market but currently where you are that's the one space that's not too close to an existing shop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Set up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, set up there. Then Grog, you lift him up and make him look super tall and we're doing this around him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The celestial will sell itself. We don't need anything fancy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In a row, in a row.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In a row, doing the same move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I Druidcraft some nice inviting looking bushes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shrubs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shrubs, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, which will definitely catch attention because no vegetation exists here for the most part.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never mind, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying it would catch attention if you want people to look in your area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it will be fancy. I think it will be fancy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plants where there are no plants is fancy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And if a slave can do that, that's pretty special.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we wait until we see him so we don't get unwanted buyers.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe you can do some flair as people are walking by.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we sit here and wait for a while?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's keep an eye out. Why doesn't whichever one of us is the one that can be sneaky and look around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all need to be voguing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're staying together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll look as we're voguing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We wait to see if the pit fiend shows himself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you guys all do like the Robert Palmer video? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Simply irresistible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to give us instruments and we'll all play something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure. I'll play a little ditty. We'll jam to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Light blue skin and pupil-less. They are held by red-colored chains and they look broken of spirit and they are both sitting with a hunch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, can we get them? Go get them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Poor Nightcrawler.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go get them and see if we can get them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they celestials?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am going to go over there and buy these two kids? For what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe and then we can set them free once we're out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, leave them alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This isn't our fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stay on target.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do one of you want to go over there and say hi, slave to slave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure, go on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Vex, by the way, your alignment's back up to Chaotic Good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! (fake sobs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the last little push there with that instance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll walk over with her so it doesn't seem weird that my slave is wandering around, I suppose. I guess?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, talk to the guy and I'll talk to the slaves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have an owner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as you approach the two of them, with the red chain around their necks and arms and they are leaning over the edge of the small wooden platform looking dejected at the ground. And approaching them, the skin itself is like a soft white porcelain with a slight translucent blue hue to it, white pupiless eyes. They look human, but they are beautiful and out of place here. Even in their destitution, you can't help but be struck by their presence. Both their chains are currently locked to this stump that is in the center of this wooden platform and behind it you see this grotesque-looking dwarf in very fine clothing that is very very dirty and old. He stands there clutching the edges of his lapel going, "All right, we've got here before you two, two I found "and kept beneath my will. For sale. With angel blood within them."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if you're looking to purchase, these will both set you back about 10,000 gold apiece or "18 for the set."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) What can they do? I would be curious to find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispering) "Whatever the fuck they can do I don't know. I wasn't selling them for their "skillset. I was selling them for their uniqueness."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) How do you know anything about these boys? How did you get them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's it to you, small one?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) I like to see a chain of ownership so I know that the previous owner will not hunt me down and kill me in the night!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's an awful-looking dwarf. "So, are you going to buy or shall I wait for the ones I'm looking for?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) Which ones are those? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Piss off."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Offer him 15 for the pair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) (whispering) Merci. (normal volume) Would you take 15 for both of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are your ears clogged? I said ten each or 18 for the bundle!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) Yes, but you don't seem to know where they come from, who they belonged to before. It's a risk that is possibly worth 3,000 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this persuasion, solely? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cash on hand? 15. (whispering) Don't tell anyone I said that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (normal voice) Are we really going to do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we are going to buy them. We are buying them!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're taking in everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're so young! They're innocents.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then we have extra slaves, it's beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Haha. Well, it's been fine doing business with you." He puts the coins away, pulls out a piece of paper. "What's your full name?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laugher)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here you are. Transference of ownership." Grabs the chains, unhooks them, takes the lock and hands it to you. "They're yours to take. Now you two shove off! Do what the man says."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) Do they have names?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! It's your choice to name them!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Au revoir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the two of you walk back with these two chained boys who walk behind you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you speak Common?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stuttering) "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did he find you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It doesn't matter, it's you who own us now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It matters, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not have this conversation with them yet, sister, until all has been taken care of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. (retching)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see why we got them now. Even better bait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come stand over with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What, sister?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (retching)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is what we are now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, slap me really hard across the face right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You realize, why is the world sideways? He knocked you to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sweet, sweet ignorance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you need a hand up, brother?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop hitting yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking off a hit point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two children follow you back. They are chained and you have them at your disposal. What are you guys going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're waiting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just waiting, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have the mansion up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not yet. I'll say to the boys: You two, have you been for sale for more than a day or two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's had us here for three days. Sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all right. In that time have you seen a large red thing with big wings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both recoil, "No, no!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, all right. Thank you. We just wait, I suppose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to go buy a few more?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, sorry. I'm sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could just say, Angels for sale!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, did you drop a bunch of gold on them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! No, no, no, we got an amazing deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like how much?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, 50 gold. It was so affordable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to do an insight check on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Insight check, okay, that's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With my gold. Yikes, no, I don't win.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is lying through her teeth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're an idiot and I'm very proud of you. Don't do that again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if I were to do a very strange accent?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, also not attractive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Vex impersonation) What if you were to talk like Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have found, put your hand up here like this when you're talking to them because Percival sounds like Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While they're talking, Keyleth, you notice, across the way, the dwarf they had spoken to and purchased these two from has packed up his things and looks around, pulls a wand out, does a large circle, and him and his kiosk vanishes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We fit right in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, there are a lot of pop-up vendors here, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know. So if you summon your magical room--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you'll be more impressive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Makes sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I survey the road in the direction of the embassy. Do we see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over in the direction of the embassy and you stare at the embassy and from this far away it's hard to make out the shape but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like the letter ah--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I stay there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: G and R, that's what you've got.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so sad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could try and scry on him while we wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, scry again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody else wants to check the road?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is an alley behind us that we set up in front of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there is an alley behind you for about 20 or so feet and then it curves off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anyone seem to be behind the alley?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see currently, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to come with me back into the alley for a little bit and watch, in case anyone sees? You could be giving me a good firm scolding, just in case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan should be visible at all times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it takes a minute to do the Scrying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax, Vex, don't argue, we'll get through this. I mean, I'm going to go back with you so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stand guard, I'll be right back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll stand watch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go back to a little dark corner and I pull out the Scrying Eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no, my name is Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, sister, do you want to perhaps do a walk around with the two boys and see if we can't attract some attention?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're splitting the party.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not getting far but I'm going to take the two boys--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You be careful with them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be very careful with them. I'm going to say, don't talk to anyone, don't look anyone in the eye, and don't answer any questions without my permission, do you understand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And don't be scared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a plan, follow my lead. This should be interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to wander off with the two boys, Keyleth, you hold the scry crystal in your hand and, as you focus, you see this flash of heat in your mind and then darkness again. The spell has no effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not even here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or he's blocking it somehow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I bet he's in the fucking Nine Hells right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Getting some money to go and come to the slave market.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's probably sold all the people that were hanging out with him last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you're aware, the scry spell fails if they're not on your plane of existence or if they succeed their saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can try again in ten minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to look around for something interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you begin to walk around, you hear the barking of various heavy-throated creatures. You come across this large, it looks almost like a wolf or dog but the face is a little less pronounced like a wolf and a little more humanoid in the front, but it is still bestial and monstrous. The coat is gray and matted and you can see these long fangs protruding. It barks and snarls but every single time it reaches for the bars-- and the bars themselves look like a flimsy wood-- but as it tries to tear at them or bite there is a spark of arcane energy and it backs up and seems to recoil from the attack and begins to pace back and forth in its cage again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I try and discern who runs this establishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also see behind that, there are two more cages that contain these very large insect-like creatures that have very long bodies with multiple legs, looks like a set of eight or so legs, almost like an oversized praying mantis, the giant pincers in the front, but they are currently collapsed on the ground within their cages resting in the heat. Behind them you see an individual that appears to be a similar racial background as Senokir, but is older with this red and graying goatee that comes to a very defined point at the end of the chin and is currently sitting, sipping off of a wine skin and watching you. (slurp)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Most humble greetings, good master.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll bow as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My sister and I have been sent by our owner to peruse the market for things that he might enjoy and I have been asked to inquire upon the nature of what you're selling and your suggested price. Never making eye contact.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. We have today, and today only, two ankhegs for sale. Mind you, not bound. The "will is yours to break. And one barghest at the front. The prices: the ankhegs are 500 gold "apiece, the barghest, 8,000 gold."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My master is always interested in creatures of unusual disposition and he will be excited to know what you have for sale. I thank you for your time. May I please leave your-- I've lost my brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, please, go."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I bow, I back off properly. What are you feeding me in this cup? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As time progresses and you guys have been wandering around, eventually the image does come across your mind as you wish to-- You wanted to Scry again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, whenever I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Still no success, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making sure that the whole market knows that there is someone perusing and purchasing for unusual creatures and making sure they see the weird twins and the two angelic-- I'm making a show of it. And I'm making a show of our non-chained obedience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it progresses, the actual twins, you notice far up the way to where The Arches begin, you see a sight you've been seeking this entire time. You see a large, deep red entity begin strolling down the street with its burly rippling armored muscles, its giant red wings flared out behind it, its horned head and crest piercing the sky behind it as its burning eyes and fanged jaw and mouth. He lumps forward with each step, and as it does, you begin to see the essence of the necklace that had been described previously, dangling around its neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Preemptive jenga.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we go back to the sales area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not going to hurry. We're going to meander so that maybe we get seen.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He gets a glimpse, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys wait in the spot that you've chosen, the pit fiend, as you've rightfully designated it at this point, begins walking through and slowly making its way through the crowd. As it glances around, you can see it strolling up to a few bars and running its claws across. You hear the (clanking) sound of it-- thank you, Criss Angel. You see it running its claws across the bars with a heavy (clanking). It seems disinterested by many of the creatures that it passes by.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I do something theatrical? Magicky?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll play a song. (singing) Hot in the city, hot in the city tonight! Tonight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perform check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy footsteps) It begins to eventually cross paths with the alley where you guys are situated. It turns its head and looks down to you, with your flaming beard and fire-wreathed head, playing your song. It slows its gait ever so slightly. It is an imposing and frightening entity. Even just being in its presence, even as you play the best you can, you feel everything almost slowed down in its proximity as its sheer immensity passes you, leaving you in its shadow for a momentary bit of time. In that moment, you feel the back of your neck stand on end. All the hairs immediately come to full point. You feel cold and alone as it sets its eyes upon you. It moves its gaze beyond and continues walking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk by with the slaves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you come by, the other direction, as you guys finish your meandering. As you walk by, it (footsteps stopping). Looks at the two boys that you've procured and slows.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll call out to Percy: (French accent) It's no use! No one has enough money for our slaves! Forget it. We should clean up and go home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course, master.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Of course, sir. We tried so hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pit fiend has turned about and is standing there with its arms crossed, watching this transpire maybe halfway up the block where you guys had set up. Its eyes narrow with a bright spark of yellow light that situates where its face is. (heavy footsteps) It saunters up in your direction, looks over to where the rest of you are, and where the two--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he coming over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's heading in your direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll summon the magnificent mansion door, and I'll say to the slaves: (French accent) All right, it was worth a try, but we must pack it in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're saying this, the pit fiend puts a hand up. Its mouth doesn't move but you hear a voice piercing deep inside your head. It says, "Stop. I have discourse to make with you, small one."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But of course. I am here to sell, if you are here to buy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have interest with your aasimar."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) They are for sale, for a good price.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already brought them into the mansion. I've already handed them off and said: Put them very far downstairs. Hide them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bring them into the mansion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. I've brought them into the mansion and have put them downstairs. The servants are taking them down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) We have already packed up for the day, but if this is a serious business proposal, well, I can go in and fetch them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bastion of power across all elements of the cosmos that you haven't had stare you down at this proximity. As it leans forward, the voice once again pierces the center of your brain. "It would do well to bring them forth."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) I cannot just communicate with them. Would you join me inside my shop? There you will see many other fine specimens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your price?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) Well, you haven't seen what I have to offer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have seen enough."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) So you are not interested in the naga, the goristro, the other celestial beings? The orcs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deceiving the devil, come on, baby!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (airhorn noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps in time, but now I seek the aasimar in your possession."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I did the airhorn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) If you please, and with due respect, I do not see any jewelry or fineries on your person. Can you afford such prices that I will quote you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say this, the eyes narrow. It leans back as its head cocks slightly. "Have you never "done business in this city before?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if you are serious, and it seems that you are by the way that you are not moving your mouth--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He begins walking away from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) Wait! Would you like to come inside with me and see them for yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has completely written you off and is walking northward, back from whence it came.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quick, throw a price out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) 30,000 apiece!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (footsteps) Slows its gait, turns around, (footsteps) keeps walking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) 10,000!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It stops. Turns around and starts heading back toward you. (footsteps) The voice once again pierces, this time even more intense, more oppressive. You've seen shadow. You've never really felt it inside you before. The voice itself presses against your will. You hear it say, "Your "price is acceptable. You know the Embassy is good to pay. Present the charges, and I will take them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I come out and bow before Scanlan and say, "Forgive me, master, for interrupting, but "the female aasimar is fighting back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) Well, put her-- ugh-- I'm so sorry, sir. I must go deal with this. I don't want to make you wait here. You are clearly a man of respect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will wait." It stays there, across the way, with its arms crossed, about ten feet from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) I will be right back, I promise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know she is much more powerful than the boys, but we cannot control her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did she use

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of it, my master! All of the magic!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. Oh my god! I run into the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you to make a deception check and you to make a deception check, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Did she use

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I inspire myself? Can I, after I know my roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's part of what's good about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, then fucking yes, I'll inspire myself. That helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an auto-fail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a 28.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, she's good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as you charge in, and you're staying outside of the door? You watch as the creature, staring at Scanlan-- or his persona-- talk to you and then charge through the doorway. The pit fiend (sniffs) looks over to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I pick him up by the top of his head and I do a one, two, three!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While I'm outside, I say: Could I offer you some refreshments, great master?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The voice echoes through your head in a way that is genuinely the stuff of nightmares. You feel your will crack slightly at its presence. It says, "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (small voice) Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I also spit in your eye so it starts to water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. I run out of the mansion. (French accent) Oh my god! Oh! It's incredible in there! She is so powerful! She cut me with her mind! Please, come with me, I will need help with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The voice says, "Your deceptions are angering and useless. If there is no business to "be had, I will let the embassy know. You will not have business in this city ever again."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I slowly flex out my black wings, slowly, and lower them, and take a step half-covering you, and say, Are you all right, master? Do you need my help?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go in the mansion and yell: Fucking jenga! We've got to fucking kill this guy! We've got to go kill him right now! Come on! Let's go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
