lines.text: Well, we're inside. Do we want to set up a sneak attack? Can we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's too late!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's outside, dude! I'm out there with him. So is Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's inside the mansion?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't really specify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're in the alleyway still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in the alleyway with the twins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are the twins and boss-man here arranged in the alley, or outside the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doorway is in the alley. It's right where the alley meets the street. Keyleth is behind the alley. The twins are on the sides of the doorway, so you guys are along the sidewalk of the street. Grog is inside, along with Scanlan, Percy, and Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's our proximity to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's about 15 feet from you guys. He's across the street, at this point, with his arms crossed, keeping a distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 feet across the street?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can go out with the two angels, get him to come over and look at them, at least. Then you guys can pour out? I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can bring them out in front of the house if you want to. Then when he walks over we can--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, bring them up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want him to hurt them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I packed this, just in case.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to be an angel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I packed Feeblemind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could maybe work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an 8th-level spell, and it makes him stupid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you look like an angel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Well, I could use Alter Self.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you make yourself step out-- no, I said there was a female.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As one of the female aasimar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are having this conversation over your earpiece?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but we're in the-- oh shit. She's not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to say. But you're in direct line of sight to the pit fiend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm not saying anything. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This guy has to make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, you do whatever you want. Give me the angels. I'm going to go back out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want me to try and make this guy stupid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, if you can! Do whatever you can! All I'm trying to do is get him to stay long enough for you guys to do something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, get him to come toward the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's 15 feet away?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you inside the mansion?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm outside. I'm in the alleyway. How many feet away am I from him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From him right now? About 35 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he aware of my presence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to saunter further down the alleyway. This has a 150-foot range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you pull even further back? Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's good. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll be behind them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Pike is coming out with the two aasimar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to get distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get ready. The minute, well, never mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So wait, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going outside with the two angels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The voice says, "You will be paid."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Money first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to fucking bargain with this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As he goes to hand over the chains, right as he goes to reach for it, I'm going to do Feeblemind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feeblemind, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus fucking Christ!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't miss and hit me, babe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, what's the DC on this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got to make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, and what's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Natural one, natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As it takes one step forward toward Scanlan, you, in the back of the alleyway, extend your finger. You watch as this slight shift of light travels forward, like a slight ripple, almost like a miniature breaking of the sound barrier. Strikes across the air. Seems to collide with the front of the pit fiend. As it hits, the energy (fizzling) dissipates, not affecting its form. You watch as the pit fiend suddenly, its attention--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He takes 4d6 psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was Scanlan walking toward him, or had they gotten right up against each other?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I release Trinket from my crystal necklace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He saved from it, didn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does not appear affected by the ability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's not affected by the ability?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, he took damage, but the Feeblemind did not seem to alter him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any of the efreeti guards around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, you do not see any. However, let's go ahead and pick up this confrontation next week. It's 11:00. If we jump into this now, we'll be here past midnight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, yeah, we're calling it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gives us time to think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We took too long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This got wonderfully bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to forget by next week. Is Scanlan walking toward him, or had Scanlan gotten right next to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan stepped out of the door and walked out just enough-- Scanlan is probably ten feet from the door, there, right behind him, just emerged from the doorway. He's about ten feet from Scanlan, and 15 from-- Correct. I'll set up the arrangement for next week. I'll put something together for you guys so you know what we're going to start with next week. But yeah, we're going to jump in, next Thursday, into a mid-street City of Brass battle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sextuplets!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex, Vax, Vax, Vex, Vex, and Vax!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here's the one thing I'm going to leave you with, because I feel this is important. As soon as you guys watch this slight dissipation of arcane energy splash across the torso and head of the pit fiend, and it steps onto its back foot, and you all realize this is the Jenga moment. As you're preparing to go into combat, you watch as the pit fiend narrows its eyes and, from immediately to its left, a small, localized gateway tears open and out from it you watch a humanoid female with large, red, feathered wings, carrying some sort of glowing lasso or rope at her side, armor, and a large weapon, with a bow slung across her shoulder, flies out next to the pit fiend. "You rang?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're doomed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, we'll see you guys next week. Thank you very much. Thank you, Ashley, for coming and playing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I won't be here next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You won't be here next week? Aw, you're filming Thursday? Aw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What you going to be working on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know. Stuffs and stuffs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay, Pike!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll get you that armor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
